This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0012 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
AN Filled from ancillary department stockFilled from ancillary department stock
FL Filled from floor stockFilled from floor stock

name: StockLocation
title: stockLocation
description: Code system of concepts specifying a stock location for older Version 2 messaging systems; not used after version 2.2 of the Standard.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0012 (STOCK LOCATION)
